targets.query: SELECT mean("hrProcessorLoad.1") FROM "pan_system" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(none)
SELECT mean(/\S+_temp/) FROM "pan_system" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(linear)
SELECT mean(/\S+_temp/) FROM "pan_system" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(linear)
SELECT mean(/fan\d+/) FROM "pan_system" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname" fill(linear)

panels.description: Number of active Conexi√≥n Per Second for Vsys
panels.title: Vsys1 Active CPS / Protocol

panels.description: Connections Per Seconds by Security Zone.

targets.query: SELECT max("panZoneActiveTcpCps") + max("panZoneActiveUdpCps") + max("panZoneActiveOtherIpCps") FROM "pan_zone" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND ("zone" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "zone" fill(linear)

panels.title: CPS by SecurityZone

panels.description: Connections Per Seconds by Protocol for each security zone.

targets.query: SELECT max("panZoneActiveTcpCps") FROM "pan_zone" WHERE ("zone" =~ /^\w/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "zone" fill(none)
SELECT last("panZoneActiveTcpCps") FROM "4weeks"."panZoneTable" WHERE ("zone" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("panZoneActiveTcpCps") FROM "4weeks"."panZoneTable" WHERE ("zone" =~ /^\w/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

panels.title: CPS by protocols and zones

targets.query: SELECT last("hrStorageUsed")/last("hrStorageSize")*100 FROM "pan_buffers" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND ("hrStorageIndex" =~ /\d\d\d\d/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hrStorageDescr" fill(linear)
SELECT difference(mean("panFlowIpfragRecv")) FROM "pan_global_counters" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("hrStorageUsed")/last("hrStorageSize")*100 FROM "pan_buffers" WHERE "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND (g"hrStorageIndex" =~ /^\d\d$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hrStorageDescr" fill(linear)

seriesOverrides.alias: Session Limit Reached for classified profile

targets.query: SELECT difference(mean("panFlowDosClSyncookieBlkDur")) FROM "pa_dos" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pan_vsys" WITH KEY = "cluster"
list.name: cluster
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pan_vsys" WITH KEY = "cluster"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pan_vsys" WITH KEY = "hostname"  WHERE cluster =~ /$cluster/
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pan_vsys" WITH KEY = "hostname"  WHERE cluster =~ /$cluster/
